tweet: ICYMI: This month, I hosted 7 town halls throughout #AZ01 & met with countless Arizonans. I look forward to heading back at the end of the month to host my next round of town halls and hear directly from you about issues in your communities. #TomInYourTown http://bit.ly/2Wecx4L¬†

Despite the wet winter, communities across #AZ01 face enormous wildfire risk as the season begins. Read more for tips on how you can mitigate fire risk near your home, or visit my website for a list of fire prevention resources.  http://bit.ly/2We7zoF¬†

We've added new mobile office hours locations in Williams and Page to expand our constituent services and reach more communities. Visit my website for a full list of mobile office hours my #AZ01 staff hosts:  http://bit.ly/2qMH78N¬† pic.twitter.com/qeB7fGg3oO

Last month, I reintroduced the CHIME Act, legislation to extend the Community Health Centers Fund for 5 years. CHCs are critical to the health and wellbeing of rural #AZ01, and we must ensure they have the funding they need to continue their mission. http://bit.ly/2HINvHv¬†

W/ unemployment rates at staggering heights across Indian Country, we must work to implement policies that attract businesses. I intro'd legislation to make permanent the Indian Employment Tax Credit to create economic growth in #AZ01 tribal communities. http://bit.ly/2I0WaEB¬†

This weekend, JoAnna Mendoza, a Veterans Services Representative on my #AZ01 staff, graduated from the Grand Canyon University Colangelo College of Business w/ her Masters of Science in Leadership. I commend her hard work and dedication, & am proud to have her on Team O'Halleran. pic.twitter.com/cNIHaNo3rl
Coming from #AZ01 to visit Washington this spring? Visit my website to see what tours we can secure for you: http://bit.ly/2nFZVli¬†
My heart breaks for the families of the victims of the shooting in San Diego. There is no place for this kind of violence in any place of worship or in any community in this country.

Today, I offer my congratulations to students from Blue Ridge High School in #AZ01 for their winning entry in the 25th annual NASA Human Exploration Rover Challenge. I look forward to seeing what these bright students accomplish next in the fields of STEM. http://bit.ly/2PuxXZ3¬†

Vaccines have saved millions of lives globally & taken enormous steps toward the eradication of many preventable diseases. This #WorldImmunizationWeek we must protect progress in global public health & ensure that children everywhere have access to lifesaving immunizations. #AZ01 pic.twitter.com/74ffF3y4HY

In recent years, fires have ravaged #AZ01 & destroyed precious natural resources. I've worked tirelessly to expedite the 4FRI Initiative, & am glad to see members of the delegation joining together to support my efforts to protect AZ‚Äôs forests and water.  http://bit.ly/2GAvurZ¬†

Transparency is not a partisan issue. Hardworking #AZ01 families deserve accountability & honesty from their elected officials in Washington. At the start of this Congress, I introduced a package of five ethics bills to hold Congress accountable to our constituents. Learn more: pic.twitter.com/DSd8USCMuC

April is National Social Security Month. My staff works w/ #AZ01 families to resolve disputes regarding their Social Security & ensure they receive what they're owed. If you‚Äôre having an issue w/ your Social Security, contact one of my district offices:  http://bit.ly/2xLUpaS¬† pic.twitter.com/AhI2J0Trpl

Last year much of #AZ01 suffered extremely dry conditions that increased the threat of wildfires & made it difficult for farmers & ranchers. This year is off to a wetter start; I'm hopeful it will enable the region to get a leg up on long-term planning. http://bit.ly/2W62C1h¬†

Today, I offer my congratulations to Jude Lykins, a junior at Marana High School, who earned the highest possible composite score of 36 on the ACT, placing him in the top 1% of test takers. I wish him all the best in his pursuit of higher education. http://bit.ly/2Vrl3QM¬†

Today, my staff hosted a Veterans round table at @NAU with the Prescott VA Claim Clinic. I‚Äôm grateful for any way my office can engage with veterans in #AZ01; we must continue to work to provide our veterans with the best possible care, no matter their zip code. pic.twitter.com/uVxxP57O0P

Last month, I was honored to be able to visit Tuba City High School's Child Development Learning Center to learn more about their successful program that sets up young children living on the Navajo Nation for success in academia. #AZ01 Read more: http://bit.ly/2DwGc1U¬†

Community health centers are critical to the health and wellbeing of #AZ01, especially in rural and underserved areas. I introduced the CHIME Act, legislation to extend the Community Health Centers Fund for 5 years. Learn more:  http://bit.ly/2HINvHv¬†

WINDOW ROCK: Having an issue with a federal program? Members of my #AZ01 staff will be at the Navajo Nation VA tomorrow meeting with constituents by appointment. Contact Paulette in my Flagstaff office to schedule a time to stop by. Details: pic.twitter.com/EHeZvZyZ89

#AZ01 veterans have faithfully served our country, & it's our responsibility to ensure they have the best care when they return home. This Saturday, veterans are invited to attend the 6th annual Graham & Greenlee Serving Veterans Resource Fair. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2UuOTzj¬†

Today we honor and remember the service of the Hopi Code Talkers. The 10 Hopi men who served during World War II developed a code language that assisted the U.S. Army in the Marshall Islands, New Caledonia, and the Philippines. #AZ01 pic.twitter.com/d3avoJdRpc

My staff will be holding #AZ01 mobile office hours in Page tomorrow. If you have questions about your Social Security, Medicare, veterans benefits, or other federal programs, stop by to talk to a caseworker. pic.twitter.com/bc3rUiUrOb
Happy #EarthDay! We are truly fortunate to call #AZ01 home. The landscapes and wildlife are some of the most beautiful in the nation. pic.twitter.com/KoVgOCRMyc

Curious about the constituent services available to you through my office? My #AZ01 staff makes mobile office hour stops throughout the state. Stop by in Camp Verde tomorrow, or visit my website for a full list of my mobile office hours:  http://bit.ly/2qMH78N¬† pic.twitter.com/5rXRM9O3aT

As a former cop & criminal investigator, I know that facts matter. What the Russians did to interfere in our elections was serious. We must conduct a thorough, bipartisan review to get a full understanding of the information in the 400-page report. #AZ01 http://bit.ly/2XmHFiL¬†

Today, the House of Representatives voted to reauthorize VAWA. I was proud to vote for this important bill, which included legislation I intro'd to expand protections to include kids & cops involved in domestic violence cases on #AZ01 tribal lands. http://bit.ly/2uMXzXi¬†

April is #NationalSocialSecurityMonth. For 84 years, Social Security has given retirees, disabled workers, & families across the country economic security. AZ community health centers serve hundreds of thousands of patients & are critical to the wellbeing of our state, esp. in rural #AZ01.  Last week, I re-introduced the CHIME Act, legislation to protect CHCs by extending the Community Health Centers Fund. http://bit.ly/2HINvHv¬†

Unemployment rates are hitting staggering highs across #AZ01 Indian Country. W/ my colleagues, I intro'd legislation to make permanent the Indian Employment Tax Credit, promoting economic growth & job creation by lessening financial burden on businesses. http://bit.ly/2I0WaEB¬†

Vets shouldn't have to go to their federal reps to help them cut thru VA red tape. W/ the AZ delegation, I intro'd the Phoenix VA Congressional Oversight Act, authorizing a pilot program to make much-needed improvements to vet health care services. #AZ01 http://bit.ly/2COzJPw¬†

I hosted a #TomInYourTown town hall in Winslow to speak w/ families abt issues rural #AZ01 faces, including access to broadband, health care, & quality infrastructure. I'm grateful to the people of Winslow for taking the time to share their concerns w/ me.  http://bit.ly/2FJmLTJ¬†
